title: CBS Radio Mystery Theater and Five Minute Mysteries

content:encoded:
Case Closed beings with The CBS Radio Mystery Theater this week. We hear their adaptation of A Study In Scarlet, first heard March 25, 1977.

(54:23) Five Minute Mysteries closes out this week’s show with The Private Elevator, their story from May 13, 1948.

Download CaseClosed772
